name: Real Theft Mission the Crime Simulator
name_original: Real Theft Mission the Crime Simulator
description:
Real Theft Mission the Crime Simulator

Perform a lot of interesting criminal missions and become the king of the gangland!
A huge arsenal of weapons will help you to defeat the opponent.

Missile is prepared fire or shoot into the air or at an objective. We need to control Missile to achieve its target.
Control your car or bike to climb hills with most realistic control to face the challenges of unique uphill & downhill environments.

This game includes many vehicles like Tank, airoplane, monster truck, carbo truck, limocar, and many more...
This game is not for Kids, It is only for Adults.
To know more about this game please download this running Game.
It is Free to Download and Play.

Key Feature:-

- Different scenarios.
- Amazing graphics and realistic animation
- Exciting gameplay: car theft, fights, murders, gunfights!
- Powerful arsenal of ammunition and weapons!
